doc.field: MetroGIS Address Points Dataset - Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
MetroGIS Address Points Dataset - Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
Contains data originating from cities and counties in the Twin Cities metropolitan area.
Contains data originating from cities and counties in the Twin Cities metropolitan area.

This dataset is a compilation of address point data from metro area address authorities, which are predominantly cities. The dataset is intended to contain a point location and the official address (as defined by the address authority) for all occupiable units and any other official addresses within the jurisdictional boundary of each address authority. A number of other attributes are available in the dataset, but may not be populated by some address authorities.
Metro area counties are playing a coordinative role to work with cities to create, maintain and aggregate address points. Currently this dataset contains points for Dakota County. It will grow over time as more counties contribute data.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>MetroGIS Address Points Dataset - Twin Cities Metropolitan Area</title><origin>Contains data originating from cities and counties in the Twin Cities metropolitan area.</origin><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>Periodically revised</pubdate><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/AddressPoints.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This dataset is a compilation of address point data from metro area address authorities, which are predominantly cities. The dataset is intended to contain a point location and the official address (as defined by the address authority) for all occupiable units and any other official addresses within the jurisdictional boundary of each address authority. A number of other attributes are available in the dataset, but may not be populated by some address authorities.
Metro area counties are playing a coordinative role to work with cities to create, maintain and aggregate address points. Currently this dataset contains points for Dakota County. It will grow over time as more counties contribute data.
</abstract><purpose>To view, query and analyze address point data anywhere it is available in the seven county metro area, and to have a single, authoritative source of the official address for any location</purpose><supplinf>Contributing counties in Minnesota</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20140211</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Currently this dataset is updated on a quarterly basis (January, April, July, October), though more frequent updates are planned in the future and additional updates between quarters are possible now. It is up to each address authority to work with their county to send updates to the data distributor, Metropolitan Council. This dataset contains all updates received by the Metropolitan Council as of the Time Period of Content date shown above.</current></timeperd><status><progress>In work</progress><update>Irregular</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey></place><theme><themekey>addresses, address points, mailing</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/MetroGISAddressPoints.jpg</browsen><browsed>Sample map showing the MetroGIS Address Points Dataset</browsed></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>A MetroGIS parcel dataset. See http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/metrogis_regional_parcels.html</title></citeinfo></crossref><native>Native environment varies by address authority.</native><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>This regional dataset requires that all contributing datasets be submitted with a standard set of attributes. However, many attributes are optional. Full databases specificaions can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Address_Points_Database_Specifications.pdf . No attempt has been made by MetroGIS to assess the accuracy of the attribute data. Please report any perceived discrepancies or errors in the data to the designated data provider. A list can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Address_Points_Data_Provider_Registry.pdf</attraccr></attracc><logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic><complete>No attempt has been made by MetroGIS to assess the completeness of addresses or attributes provided by address authorities. The datasets tested to ensure that all required attributes are populated.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>No attempt has been made by MetroGIS to assess the horizontal positional accuracy of points in this dataset. See the Positional Accuracy Indicator attribute for feature level information about positional accuracy.</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>Each county participating in the MetroGIS GIS Address Points Dataset works with the city address authorities within their jurisdiction to create and maintain the address points data. Counties then contribute a file geodatabases to the Metropolitan Council where they are aggregated using geoprocessing methods and made available for redistribution. No attempt is made to further process the data at the regional level. For information about lineage at the data development level, contact each address authority. </procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>Address</indspref><direct>Point</direct><mgmg3obj>Point</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>One layer for entire area covered</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><eainfo><overview><eaover>A list of the attribute names and field types is shown below. Detailed information about the attributes can be found at: http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Address_Points_Database_Specifications.pdf
Field Name Descriptio ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ADD_ID_NAT: National Address Unique ID (Text 60) ADD_ID_LOC: Local Address Unique ID (Text 50) ANUMBERPRE: Address Number Prefix (Text 6) ANUMBER: Address Number (Integer10) ANUMBERSUF: Address Number Suffix (Text 6) ANUMBERSEP: Address Number Separator Element (Text 1) ST_PRE_MOD: Street Name Pre Modifier (Text 10) ST_PRE_DIR: Street Name Pre Directional (Text 9) ST_PRE_TYP: Street Name Pre Type (Text 24) ST_NAME: Street Name (Text 42) ST_POS_TYP: Street Name Post Type (Text 12) ST_POS_DIR: Street Name Post Directiona (Text 9) ST_POS_MOD: Street Name Post Modifier (Text 12) SUB_TYPE1: Subaddress Type 1 (Text 12) SUB_ID1: Subaddress Identifier 1 (Text 12) SUB_TYPE2: Subaddress Type 2 (Text 12) SUB_ID2: Subaddress Identifier 2 (Text 12) MUNI_NAME: Municipal Jurisdiction Name (Text 30) MUNI_CODE: Munipal Jurisdiction Code (Text 8) USPS_PLACE: USPS Place Name (Text 30) CO_CODE: County Code (Text 3) CO_NAME: County Name (Text 20) STATE_CODE: State Code (Text 2) ZIP: Zip Code (Text 5) ZIP4: Zip Plus 4 (Text 4) LOC_DESC: Location Description (Text 40) LANDMARK: Landmark Name (Text 40) RESIDENCE: Residence (Text 10) MAILABLE : Mailable Address (Text 10) STATUS: Lifecycle Status (Text 10) PIN: Parcel Unique Identifier (Text 17) LONGITUDE: Longitude (Double) LATITUDE: Latitude (Double) POSI_ACCU: Positional Accuracy Indicator (Integer2) ADIRSOURCE: Address Direct Source (Text 40) AAUTHORITY: Address Authority (Text 40) EDIT_ORG: Editing Organization (Text 40) UPDATEDATE: Update Date (Date) COMMENTS: Comments (Text 254)</eaover><eadetcit>A detailed description of the attributes available in this dataset can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Address_Points_Database_Specifications.pdf</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>MetroGISAddressPoints</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE:
